job.title: Senior Front End Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongAbout SwarmstrongppbrppSwarmnbspis enabling global connectivity with the worlds most affordable satellite network Backed by the founders of Paypal Boingo Earthlink Yammer and more Swarm is making IoT connectivity accessible everywhere on Earth at all times With 120 satellites already in orbit Swarm provides connectivity to customers across agriculture maritime logistics global development energy etc From creating more efficient global supply chains and reducing crop spoilage to tracking endangered species and monitoring water access in Africa the number of use cases that the Swarm network supports is almost unlimitedppbrppSwarm developed the worlds smallest communication satellite and will have 150 in orbit by the end of 2021 Our team ambitiously handles everything inhouse from hardware and software to design testing regulatory marketing sales and more This allows us to move quickly be agile to changes in demand and constantly improve our productsppbrppWe are a small scrappy team that moves quickly and takes calculated datadriven risks We are collaborative and support one another everyday Were looking for team members who are eager to wear many hats want to have a major impact within a company and are ready to jump into a highgrowth highvelocity startup environmentppbrppstrongThe rolestrongppbrppSwarm is looking to hire a senior front end software engineer to join our cloud services team You will work primarily on the Swarm Hive our customerfacing dashboard that allows customers to see and manage their data that has been transmitted via the Swarm satellite networknbspppbrppWe are open to a variety of experience levels and will adjust the seniority of the role and scope of responsibilities accordinglyppbrppstrongYour impactstrongppbrpulliImplement and scale a simple elegant networkasaservice software productliliImplement industry best practices in an evolving codebaseliliDesign architect and build scalable userfacing softwareliliBuild enterprise web applications with thoughtful and clean UXliliIntroduce and implement industry best practices including code style build test and deploymentliliHelp translate customer requirements into an engineering roadmapliliBuild ship and maintain core software featuresliliResponsible for significant aspects of system design and design documentsliulpbrppstrongWhat were looking forstrongppbrpulliMinimum of 2 years experience in software engineering We are also open to more senior candidates and will adjust the seniority of the role and scope of responsibilities accordinglyliliSignificant professional experience working in React and TypescriptliliExperience building and maintaining scalable software systemsliliProven track record writing clean modular code that is highly performant and welltestedliliComfortable working in Java and SQL preferredliliExperience working at a startup strongly preferredliliFamiliarity with UIUX design preferredliulpbrppstrongOur stack you dont need to be an expert in all of these but this is what we usestrongppbrpulliJava Spring Boot and Go microservices deployed in KubernetesliliReactliliTypeScriptliliAWSliliPostgresliliRedisliulpbrppstrongWhat youll get with SwarmstrongppbrpulliThe opportunity to create and deploy truly worldchanging technology with a significant impactliliConstant learning from your colleagues and our amazing array of international customersnbspliliTrue impact autonomy and ownership over your work including crossfunctional collaboration and working closely with our cofoundersliliRapid career growth and development opportunities within a highgrowth startup environmentliliCompetitive compensation with equity in a highgrowth company and benefitsliulpbrppbrppDue to applicable export control laws and regulations candidates must be a US citizen or national US permanent resident ie current Green Card holder or lawfully admitted into the US as a refugee or granted asylumppbrppSwarm is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation protected veteran status disability age or other legally protected statusp
